remarks: Implication in terms of disjunction for a decidable proposition.  Based on theorem *4.6 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 120.  The reverse direction, ~ imorr , holds for all propositions.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 20-Apr-2018.)
statement: imordc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( ( ph -> ps ) <-> ( -. ph \/ ps ) ) ) $.
